creator: abaptist@cleversafe.com
text:
This is caused by a missing space when using the _topDir parameter. More details can be found here:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/intrepid/+source/ant/+bug/296409

This problem occurs on my Ubuntu system
Fix applied using the description. (svn revision 742061, http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=742061&view=rev )
creator: jkf@apache.org
antoine@apache.org
text: *** Bug 45316 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
